import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import "../App.css" import serImg from "../images/server_img.png" import { getData, getPost } from '../redux/actions/actions' export default function Shop() { const [produit, setproduit] = useState() const [prix, setPrix] = useState("") const [file, setfile] = useState("") const [verified, setverified] = useState(""); const [verifieds, setverifieds] = useState("") const dispatch = useDispatch() const selectors = useSelector(state => state) const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const data = new FormData(); data.append("prix", prix) data.append("file", file) await axios({ method: "post", withCredentials: true, data: data, url: "http://localhost:9000/api/post", }).then((user) => { setproduit(user); }).catch((err) => { console.log(err) }) } const removePost = (id) => { axios({ method: 'get', url: 'http://localhost:9000/api/delete/' + id, withCredentials: true, }) .then((response) => { setverified(response) }) .catch((err) => { console.log(err) }) } useEffect(async () => { await dispatch(getPost(selectors.getUser._id)); console.log(selectors.getUser._id) }, [produit, verified]) const datas = selectors.getPost[3].map(data =>
Prix : {data.prix}
